content:
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/carin-bb/ValueSet-C4BBClaimOutpatientInstitutionalDiagnosisType.html
Has 4 values, principal|other|externalcauseofinjury|patientreasonforvisit. Is "externalcauseofinjury" really a diagnosis type?
Yes, Joe I've made my externalcauseofinjury diagnosis, you have a broken tibia.
Yes, Joe I've made my principal diagnosis, you have have a broken tibia, caused by falling off a ladder.

Definition of field where this VS is bound is here: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/carin-bb/StructureDefinition-C4BB-ExplanationOfBenefit-Outpatient-Institutional-definitions.html#ExplanationOfBenefit.diagnosis.type
I understand where it is bound, my question is about the content of the value set, not where it's bound at.
Based on the description, it seems intent on covering more than primary/secondary.
